subject: Playoff Games
World Series
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Akinori Iwamura supplied the Rays’ game-changing hit in the fifth inning with an opposite-field, two-run homer off Mark Buehrle, the White Sox’ starter.
snippet: Akinori Iwamura supplied the Rays’ game-changing hit in the fifth inning with an opposite-field, two-run homer off Mark Buehrle, the White Sox’ starter.
